title: Sea Level Rise in the United States

content.question: Based on the information in the map, which areas in the United States have experienced the greatest sea level rise?

choices.label: The Northeast and the Gulf of Mexico
The Southeast and the West Coast
The state of California and the state of Hawaii
The Pacific Northwest and the state of Alaska

content.answer: The Northeast and the Gulf of Mexico

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
